Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temp. rerouted via LaSalle Dr, Outer Lake Shore Dr, and exit at Oak to Michigan at Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via LaSalle Dr, Outer Lake Shore Dr, and exit at Oak to Michigan,  due to street blockage near Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays at 95th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays at 95th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
